tgt_original: laukikalokottarasiddhyartham iti laukikasiddhir akaniṣṭhabhuvanaparyantam |  lokottaraṃ ca buddhatvaṃ mahāmudrākṣarajñānam |
śṛṇv ityādi bhagavato vākyam uddeśasamāptiṃ yāvat |
dīnām saṃcāro vāmadakṣiṇamadhyarandhreṣu gamanāgamanam |  nāḍisaṃcāram āyāmam iti prāṇāyāmam |
uddeśas trividhas tantre sarvasmin |  tathā nirdeśas trividho bhavet |
pratyuddeśo mahoddeśa ity uddeśasya prabhedaḥ |  pratinirdeśako'para iti mahānirdeśa ākṣiptah |
etau ca nirdeśasya prabhedau |  uddeśa evetyādi |
ya evoddeśaḥ sa eva nirdeśaḥ |  sa ca tantrasaṃgītir ucyate |
atha vajrapāṇinirmāṇakāyaḥ sucandro rājā paramādibuddhatantrarāje sekārthaṃ
sucandra āheti he śāstaḥ sekaḥ saptavidha udakādyanujñāvasānaḥ |
mahoddeśaś ceti cakrārād mahacchabdākṣepe mahānirdeśa ucyate |  dvayam etad yathāsaṃkhyam alpaṭīkā bṛhaṭṭīkā cocyate |
evam ity uktakrameṇa ṣaṭkoṭibhiḥ ṣaḍvidhair alpatantrabṛhattantrasaṃgītyādikaiḥ śuddhaṃ pariśuddham ādibuddhaṃ kālacakrābhidhānakaṃ syād iti vakṣyamāṇena saṃbandhaḥ |

tgt_original: kāyavākcittasaṃśuddhyā abhiṣekadvayaṃ dvayam ity udakamukuṭābhyāṃ kāyaśuddham |
pratyuddeśaś ceti cakārāt (38)  pratiśabdākṣepe pratinirdeśa ucayate |
sā ca padamātrabhañjikā na sarvārthasūcikā |  yataś tīkā sarvārthasūciketi vakṣyate |
kumbhādayas tu sekā maṇḍalavartanam antareṇāpi deyāḥ |
janakaḥ sarvatāyinām iti tāyināṃ pañcatathāgatānāṃ nirāvaraṇatvena janakaḥ |
ata evāha | astināstivyatikrāntair ity abhāva ityādi |
iha hy ālambanaṃ dvividham |  pratyakṣapūrvakaṃ bhavet |  anumānapūrvakaṃ cet |
tatra pratyakṣapūrvakaṃ tad vyapagatasakalakalpanākalaṅkaṃ sadgurumārgopadeśajātatattvayogād gaganetārācakravad anekasaṃbhogakāyaṃ māṃsacakṣurgrāhyam
prathamaṃ māṃsacakṣuṣādikarmiyogi viśvam abhijñām antareṇa paśyati | (41)
tataḥ prajñācakṣuṣā bodhisattvāvadhivaśāt |  tato jñānacakṣuṣā samyaksaṃbuddhāvadhivaśāt |
anyair aparā yā śuddhiḥ sā dhātvādiśuddhitaḥ | (40)
tad āha | udakam ityādi |  vajraghaṇṭā mahākṣaram iti vajraṃ mahākṣaraśuddham |
evaṃ tathāgatasya pañcacakṣūṃṣi māṃsādīni śūnyatādarśanaṃ praty uktāni |
tathātītānāgataṃ dharmaṃ paricintitam ambare (42)  śūnye sarvākārabimbe tattvayogī labdhanirvikalpamārgaḥ paśyati |
anumānapūrvakam ālambanārthaṃ tattvataḥ kalpanaṃ citrādopadarśitaṃ bālayogināṃ śūnyatāmārgāvatāranārtham |
asyāḥ pratisenāyā dṛśyamānāyā yo bhāvaḥ pratibhāsalakṣaṇaḥ sa na bhāvaḥ syāt tad vastu na bhavati |
tasmād abhāve bimbe svapnādisadṛśe yā bhāvanālambanaṃ sā yogināṃ bhāvanā kalpanā na bhavaty akalitahetūdbhūtatvāt |
cittasya yataḥ pratibhāsamānam apahnotuṃ na śakyate |
aṇusaṃdohā bhāvāś ca na gṛhyate pratibimbavat |
yad apītyādi |  anyacakṣurbhyāṃ paśyatīty api nety āha |
kumāryā yad dṛśyamānam ajātam anutpannaṃ tat tasyā jātakaṃ yathotpannam ity arthaḥ |
īdṛśe svapnamāyāsadṛśe bimbe dṛṣṭe sati tatas tadanantaraṃ prāṇāyāmaṃ pūrakakumbhakarecakaṃ nirantaram anavacchinnaṃ kuryāt |
viḍnāḍī bhūsvabhāvā |  mūtranāḍī vāyusvabhāvā |  śukranāḍī jñānasvabhāvā | (44)
cintāmaṇir ivetyādi kalpanāpoḍhatvam abhrāntatvaṃ ca jñānasyāha |
nanu yad anālambanaṃ tat kathaṃ jagadarthakāri viṣayeṇa vinotpattir ity āha |  adṛṣṭim ityādi |
prajñāṅgabhāvo hy upāye bhavati suratakāle cittasya tadākāratvāt |
ariṣṭam akālamaraṇalakṣaṇam adhikamārutair bhavati |  ūrdhve'dhaś ca kayor ity āha |
yadādho viḍnāḍī niruddhā bhavati tadordhve vāmanāḍyām ariṣṭaṃ bhavati |  yadā mūtranāḍī niruddhā bhavati todordhve dakṣiṇanāḍyām ariṣṭaṃ bhavati |
taminīśukravāhiṇyor māruta utpattir garbhād nirgamaḥ |  maraṇaṃ sthitiḥ svasthitā |
etad āha | utpādetyādi |  lagnodayābhisaṃdhau ceti | vāma- (45)
ṣaṭpañcāśad ityādi |  divāniśam ahorātre dvādaśasaṃkrāntau pañcasaptatyadhikaṣaṭśataśvāsān madhyamā vahati |
vāmā dakṣinā ca nāḍī pañcasaptatyadhikaṣaṭśataśvāsonān yān ekaviṃśatisahasrān ṣaṭśatair adhikāṃs tān vahati |
tripakṣyadhikatrivarṣāṇi ca śatavarṣe pūrṇe vahati madhyamā |
candras toyadhātur upāyasya śukradhātoḥ kāyo bhavati |  prajñāyā rajodhātor divākaras tejodhātur vāg bhavati |
vāmā savyā dakṣiṇordhve prāṇe yathākrameṇa saṃjñā candro'rkaś ca |
ūrdhve yā madhyamā (46)  sādhaḥ savyā śukravāhiṇī |

src_original: ལྟེ་བའི་ཆུ་སྐྱེས་ལ་། སའི་ཡོན་ཏན་ལྔ་སྟེ་དྲི་དང་། གཟུགས་དང་། རོ་དང་། རེག་བྱ་དང་། སྒྲའི་མཚན་ཉིད་དོ་༎

tgt_original: lalāṭābje maruto dviguṇaḥ sparśaśabdalakṣaṇaḥ |  uṣṇīṣābje śūnyasya śabdamātraguṇaḥ |
sṛṣṭyā ca śūnyādinā ca |  kṣitau nābhimaṇḍale viśati |
adho nābhau guhye ca maṇyabje śaṅkhinī kāyavākcittavāhiṇī sattvarajastamobhedena tridvyekaguṇātmikā saṃhārakrameṇa nirgacchati |
eṣā śaṅkhinī strīṇāṃ sukhāt surate śukraṃ vahati |
adha ity apāne madhyamā nāḍī cetyādinā |  viḍmūtravāhinyor upary ūrdhvanāḍīdvayasaṃcāreṇa svabhāvam āha |
ūrdhve yā vāmanāḍī sādho madhyā viḍnāḍī |  ūrdhve yā dakṣiṇā sādho vāmā mūtravāhiṇī |
ūrdhve prāṇe savyāvasavyayor vāmadakṣiṇayoḥ prajñopāyāṅgabhāvo'dho'pāne |  ūrdhvādho rajaḥśukrapravāhayoḥ | (47)
madhye madhyamāmārge ṣaṣṭhaṃ jñānamaṇḍalam ākāśādipañcamaṇḍalāt pratyekamaṇḍalasya sapādaikādaśaśvāsān gṛhītvā sapādaṣaṭpañcāśataśvāsātmakaṃ vahati |
āsāṃ vāmadakṣiṇamadhyanāḍīnām ahorātreṇa yathākramaṃ nābhipadme dvādaśadalātmake ṣaṣṭimaṇḍalāni |
vāme ca lagne viṣame meṣādye dakṣiṇalagne same vṛṣabhādye |
tatra dakṣiṇe vṛṣalagne yadā vahati vāyus tadā mūle nāsāpuṭasyādhobhāge bhūmimaṇḍalaṃ daṇḍaikaṃ vahati |
yādhaḥ strīṇāṃ khagamukhā śukravāhataḥ saiva yadā rajo vahati tadā caṇḍālī bhavati |  tasminn eva cartukāle strīṇām ūrdhvanāḍī ḍombī bhavati |
puṃsaḥ puruṣasya tv ṛtukāle śukrāgamanakāle saiva ḍomby avadhūtī syāt |
pūrva ity ūrdhvamaṇḍale yathākramaṃ dharā pṛthivī vāyuś ca |  anayoḥ parasparaṃ prajñopāyakāraṇam āha | (49)
tathā hi parakulāliṅganena kāryodayo na svakulāliṅganena svātmani kriyā virodhāt |
atrāpi vahnidhātujanitaṃ rasaviṣayam |  toyodhātūdbhūtaṃ rasanendriyaṃ gṛhṇāti |

vāmanāḍyāṃ lagnodayam āha |  dalamadhya iti yadā vāmanāḍyāṃ meṣādinā nāsāpuṭamadhye śūnyamaṇḍalaṃ vahati tadābhyantare'pi dalamadhye vahatīti vakṣyate |  tataḥ pūrva ity ūrdhve vāyumaṇḍalaṃ savye'gnimaṇḍalam |
madhyamāpravāha yogenācyutasukhena bodhicittoddhāriteṇa sā vajraśikhāyāṃ kartavyā |
vāmāyāṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ vā yathākrameṇādhiko vāyur ekarātram |
daṃṣṭrā mudrā pakṣamudrā kṛtiḥ |  kartarīti kartarikā mudrā kanīyasī |
hi sūryaś candraguṇāñ śabdasparśarasarūpagandhān gṛhītvāriṣṭadināni darśayati |
te pañca pañcakena pañcamī yāvad vṛddhiḥ |
tataḥ ṣaṣṭhasaptamarāśāv ekottareṇa kramād vṛddhir iti |
śunyamaṇḍalasaṃyoga iti vāmadakṣiṇavāhināṃ daśamaṇḍalānāṃ saṃyoga ekatvaṃ madhyamā- (50)
karatale puṭite mūrdhni śirasi kṛta ekamukhaṃ vajraṃ bhavati |
yatra prāṇasya nivṛttiḥ kaiścid api kartuṃ na śakyate |
pūrve janmalagnapatre trivarṣād aśītyuttarasahasradinagaṇād makarāt pañcatriṃśadadhikaśatadinagaṇaṃ tyajati |
tatas tad apatraṃ śūnyīkṛtya dvitīyapatre'vaśeṣadinagaṇaṃ gṛhītvā prāṇaśaktiḥ praviśati |
tato dvitīyapatraṃ śūnyīkṛtyāvaśeṣadinaṃ (52)  gṛhītvā caturthe praviśati |
tataḥ patraṃ śūnyīkṛtyāvaśeṣadinaṃ gṛhītvā pañcame praviśati |
tataḥ pauṣṇakālāt śukradhātukṣayārtham |  aṣṭamapatrādiṣu krameṇa trayastriṃśaddinārohaḥ |
avidyādvādaśāṅgasvarūpaḥ puṭo bhūmyādau likhitvā prathamapuṭe pūrvādiṣu makarādijanmarāśiprabhṛtāv ariṣṭadināvaśeṣāyuṣo varṣamāsadinabhedena yathākramanyāsam āha |
dinais tithidikpañcaguṇadvyekaiś caivaṃ dehinām āyur gacchati |
tata ekādaśamaṃ śūnyīkṛtyāvaśeṣadinatrayaṃ gṛhītvā dvādaśame praviśati |
avaśeṣaṃ dinam ekaṃ gṛhītvā karṇikāṃ praviśati |
evam aśītyuttarasahasrasaṃkhyaiḥ (53)  sarvasya madhyasya trivarṣadinaiḥ prāṇaśaktir dvādaśarāśicakraṃ tyajati |
tato vijñānam api tyaktvā śvāsacakradharmapreritaprāṇavāyur nāsārandhragatyantare saṃbhramati |
mūlād iti prāṇasya janmarāśidinād ekottareṇa candrasyārohaṇakrameṇa caturmāsapakṣabhedādinā |
tatrāpi pūrvavad dvādaśacakraṃ likhitvā prathamapuṭe'riṣṭadinaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśadāyurmāsās tu dvitīyapuṭe sthāpanīyāḥ |
ariṣṭavṛddhidvitīyamāsānte tṛtīyamāsapraveśe tasminn eva patre dinadvayaṃ vahati |
aṣṭamaṃ śūnyīkṛtyāvaśeṣam ekaviṃśatidinaṃ gṛhītvā navame praviśati |
avaśeṣam ekādaśadinaṃ gṛhītvā daśame praviśati navamaṃ śūnyīkṛtya |
daśame pañcadinaṃ tyaktvāvaśeṣadinaṃ gṛhītvaikādaśame praviśati |  tatra dinatrayaṃ tyajati |
evaṃ pañcaviṃśatiṣaḍviṃśatisaptaviṃśaddināni yadā vahati tadā navamaṃ patraṃ tyajati |  patratrayaṃ saṃkrāntiṃ karoti |

src_original: དེ་ནས་འདབ་མ་གཉིས་པ་ལ་། ཟླ་བ་བདུན་པ་དང་། བརྒྱད་པ་དང་། དགུ་པ་ལ་གྲངས་བཞིན་དུ་། ཉི་མ་བཞི་དང་། ལྔ་དང་། དྲུག་རྣམས་རྒྱུའོ་༎
tgt_original: tato dvitīye punaḥ saptāṣṭanavame ca māse yathāsaṃkhyaṃ catuṣpañcaṣaḍdināni vahanti |
evam aṣṭāviṃśatitriṃśatidināni yadā vahati tadā daśamapatraṃ tyajati |  patradvaye saṃkrāntiṃ karoti |
mṛtyoḥ kālasya śatavarṣe pūrṇe madhyamārohaṇaṃ samaviṣamadinair vṛṣādimeṣādyair janmajātaiś ca maṇḍalaiḥ pṛthivyādikaiḥ |
ekatriṃśaddinaṃ dvātriṃśaddinaṃ yadā vahati tadaikādaśamapatraṃ tyajati |
anyathetyādi |  yadi tat prakarśati na bhidyate |  vajrotthānadvāreṇāvadhūtimārge prāṇamāruto na viśati |  adhaś cāpānavāyuḥ śaṅkhinyāṃ na viśati |
maraṇaṃ tadaveśatas tayoḥ prāṇāpānavāyvor avadhūtyāṃ (57)  śaṅkhinyāṃ vāpraveśataḥ |  maraṇam eva |
uṣṇīṣāt sakāśād ūrṇāpaṅkaje bhrūmadhye śukrasyāgamanam ānandaṃ prathamam |
tataḥ pūrvapatre'vāhitadinatrayād dvādaśame patre dinadvayaṃ vahati |
yāvat prāṇasya sa cakravicchedo bhavati vāmāriṣṭeṇa maraṇam ayogino yānti | (56)
tato vividhaṃ ramaṇaṃ krīḍanagāḍhāliṅganaśītkāra kaṇṭhakūjanādilakṣaṇaṃ nābhau (58)  guhye ca gataṃ bodhicittaṃ viramānandaṃ tṛtīyam |
uṣṇīṣe lalāṭe pūrṇā prathamānandādibhedena śukrapratipad dvitīyā tṛtīyā caturthī pañcamī lakṣaṇā |
kaṇṭhe hṛdaye ca ṣaṣṭhī saptamy aṣṭamī navamī daśamy aparā pūrṇā |
guhyād vajramaṇiparyantam acyutaṃ bodhicittaṃ sahajānandaṃ caturtham |
nābhau guhya ekādaśī dvādaśī trayodaśī caturdaśī pañcadaśī tṛtīyā pūrṇā |
guhyapadmā tayā bodhicitte guhye gate paramānandād yā ṣoḍaśī kalā sā maṇipadme vajramūrdhnigā bhavati |
tasmād ūrdhvaṃ kṛṣṇapratipadāgame virāgapraveśakāle cyutikālaḥ syāt |
asya sūryasya ṣoḍaśī kaloṣṇīṣakamale gatā saiva naṣṭacandra ity ākhyātaḥ |
sūrya eva rajo rajodharmitvād ūrdhve yāti |
tayoḥ pūrṇimāmāvāsyoḥ kalā yathākrameṇoṣṇīṣe vajramaṇau ca buddhānām iti | (61)
vajrapadaṃ jñānapadaṃ viparītam iti pratiṣṭhitam ity arthaḥ |
yata evam ato'smāt kāraṇāc candrāmṛtasya śukradhātor ūrdhvam upari gamanam upadeśataḥ |
adhaś cārkarajaso gamanaṃ rāhulakṣaṇasya vijñānasyākṣarasukhaṃ gamanaṃ kartavyam iti |
ūrṇetyādi |  candrāmṛtasya śukradhātoḥ pūrṇimā pūrṇatvaṃ buddhānām ūrṇābje bhavati |
adha-upāyasyety adho vajrāgrād yat spharaṇaṃ kāyānāṃ tad upāyaś ca prajñāyāḥ punar ūrdhvato bhavet |
nanu candrasya sarvadā vṛddhyā bhavitavyam ity āha |
tathā hi yo vṛddhas tenāvaśyaṃ kṣayiṇā bhavitavyam anyathā nityatāprasaṅgaḥ |
na ca nityo'rthaḥ kaścid asti yena tasya nityatvaṃ parikalpanīyam |
tathāpy utpādavyaya eva tasya svabhāvo bhavatu |  ko doṣa ity āśaṅkyāha |
svabhāvābhāvadharmāṇām iti svabhāvasyābhāvo yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yaḥ kṣayotpādaḥ sā māyā | (63)
ata eva na kṣayaṃ yānti bhūtāni na jāyanta iti saṃyogaviyogamātratvāt |
svaprajñāyā vividhalakṣaṇayāliṅgitaṃ cittaṃ padme guhye gataṃ yad maṇau vajramaṇau tac candragataspandarūpeṇa spandabhāvanā |
yadā hi gurūpadeśena praviṣṭe marīcikādimārge tadā tisro nāḍyaḥ pariśuddhā bhavanti |
tāsu pariśuddhāsu yadi kāyanāḍyāṃ prāṇo vahati tathāpi prāṇāyāmaḥ kartavyaḥ sa ca kāyabhāvanā |
lalāṭa ityādi |  asyāḥ prajñāyāḥ kāyavajro lalāṭe pūrvavad viparīteṇa |
evaṃ vāgnāḍyāṃ vāgbhāvanā |  cittanāḍyāṃ madhyamāyāṃ cittabhāvaneti |
vāsanety āvaraṇaṃ tasyā haraṇam apanayanam | tat pūrṇa- (64)
candrasya na cchedo na ca tasya pūraṇam |
tathoditaṃ jñānaṃ kramāt spandādibhedena bhūmibhir muditādyābhir ūrdhvam uṣṇīṣe pūrṇatāṃ yāti |
na jñānacchedo na ca tasya pūraṇam iti |
tena pūrṇāyāṃ na śaśī sthiraḥ pratipatpraveśakālakṣayatvāt |
tathākṣare sukhe cittam asthiram |  saṃsāravāsanā kṣarasukhalakṣaṇādyāliṅgitatvāt |
jagatāṃ rāgavirāgābhyāṃ pūrṇā na pratiṣṭhitety āha |
ekakṣaṇābhisaṃbuddhaṃ yadā pūrṇāyāṃ guhyapadme niścalaṃ cittaṃ bhavet tadā taccittaṃ vajraṃ vajramaṇau niṣpandena sarvakṣaṇapūrakaṃ dvyayutadvyaṣṭaśataśvāsalakṣaṇam
evam asya cittasya na śuklapakṣe rāge sthitiḥ |
na ca gamanam asite pakṣe virāge |
ate eva pakṣadvayamadhyasthaṃ pūrṇāyāṃ gatam advayam apratiṣṭhitam |
yadā śaṅkhinīnāḍyāṃ śukranāḍyāṃ jñānabhāvanākṣarabhāvanā bhavati tadā samāhāra ekatvaṃ trivajrāṇāṃ trināḍīnām |
śiraso lalāṭāt pūrṇāpadaṃ guhyasthānaṃ bandhanaṃ paramārthata iti prāṇabandhanenākṣarasukhena |
punar apy evam udayaḥ punar maṇau pūrṇatā |
sa virāgāt kalāhānir na dehināṃ jñānahānir iti |
asya bodhicittasya mahāsukhasvabhāvaḥ sa pūrṇāśabdena bhaṇyate |
asya bodhicittasya niścalasya pūrṇāyāṃ guhyapadma ūrdhvam bhūmibhiḥ paripūrṇatā |
pakṣadvayaṃ vāmadakṣiṇaṃ meṣavṛṣādidvādaśarāśilakṣaṇam ākramya nirudhya dvādaśākārasatyārthaṃ dvādaśabhūmilābhataḥ |
ekārtham advayam iti yad advayadharmaṃ tad ekārtham ubhayapa- (67)
uṣṇīṣetyādi |  tasya bodhisattvasyoṣṇīṣād udayaṃ pūrṇā vajramaṇau bhavet |  sa virāgāt kalāhāniḥ kalāya cayo vajrāt sakāśād bhavati |
ayaṃ dhātusamūho lohādiko raseṇa pāradeṇa bhakṣito yathā rasatvaṃ yāti tat samo bhavati |
yathā vā bījaiḥ kādravādikaiḥ kṣityādiko dhātusamūho bhakṣito bījasvabhāvatvaṃ yāti |
sa eva phalakāle phalodayakāle mānavarjitaḥ saṃkhyārahito bhavati | (68)
evaṃ bhāvasamūho'pi sthiracalātmakaḥ paramākṣarabhakṣitaḥ sarvākārabimbena nirāvaraṇīkṛtaḥ paramākṣaratvam āyāti |
pūrṇāvasthāṃ vyāpitvaṃ gate viṣe daṣṭako daṃśasthāne vedanāduḥkhaṃ na vetti |
na ca viṣayān rūpādīn indriyadvāraiś cakṣurādibhir vetti |
evaṃ citte pūrṇakalāṃ gate vyāpitvaṃ gate na yogī vajramaṇau vetti satsukhaṃ nānyatrāpi na viṣayān indriyadvārair iti |
sarvataḥ smṛtimāl loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati || iti |
nadīnām udakaṃ praviṣṭaṃ tat samudre samatvaṃ yāti |
tathāyaṃ bhāvasamūhaḥ sthiracalātmako'kṣare sarvākārabimbe samas tulyo'kṣaro bhavati |
na cittāt sakāśāc cirakālikaḥ paścād utpanna ity arthaḥ |
atha cittaṃ vinā jātas tadartham āha |
yady ayam āgantuko malas tāmre tadā pūrvaṃ tāmraṃ kālikārahitam |
yadā cirakālī malaḥ paścāt tāmrasya sadbhāvas tadā tasya malasya kutaḥ kasmāt saṃbhavaḥ |
bhavaḥ | atha tāmre'vyayatvena saṃsthitas tadā siddharaseṇāpy apanetuṃ na śakyate |
tasmāt sarvam etad yuktyā na saṃgacchati |
tasmād idam atrārthasatyam |  tāmreṇa sahotpanno'py ayaṃ kāliko rasayogād naśyati na paścād na pūrvaṃ na tadrahita iti |
asukhād dhetoḥ |  cyutir eva saṃsārahetur iti pratipādayati |
yadi teṣāṃ virāgasaṃbhūtir na bhavati tadā nānyaprakāreṇa (71)
yeneti cyutisukhavivarjaneṇa |  kāmuka ityādinākṣarasukhe yatnam āha |
ādhāre cyutim āpanna ādheyasya virāgatā bhavati |
ataś cyutirāgaṃ vivarjayed ity uktena saṃbandhaḥ |  vaimalyasyāvasthām āha |
akṣarodbhavakāyasya cittasyorṇācakramadhyagatasyālikālyor vāmadakṣiṇayoḥ samāyogo mīlanaṃ madhyamāpravāhitvaṃ hūṃkārādyaṃ ca madhyamāpravāhanibandhanaṃ neṣyate |
āgantukaśabdaḥ kathaṃ boddhavya iti ced ucyate |
yauvane surate prāptā svayam eva vetti |
